data.sentence: The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: to water, give/ask to drink, irrigate. siqayatun - drinking cup.
data.sentence: The word يُسْقَوْنَ comes from the root س ق ي and is associated with the meanings: to water, give/ask to drink, irrigate. siqayatun - drinking cup.
The word رَحِيقٍ comes from the root ر ح ق and is associated with the meanings: pure, delightfully refreshing wine.

data.meanings: To seal/stamp/imprint/impress, to secure/protect oneself against a thing, produce an impression or effect upon a thing, reach the end of a thing, cover over a thing, turn away/avoid/shun someone or something, to not understand, prevent the heart from believing, feign heedlessness.
data.sentence: The word مَخْتُومٍ comes from the root خ ت م and is associated with the meanings: To seal/stamp/imprint/impress, to secure/protect oneself against a thing, produce an impression or effect upon a thing, reach the end of a thing, cover over a thing, turn away/avoid/shun someone or something, to not understand, prevent the heart from believing, feign heedlessness.
